summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackELEMIS Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Wash is an enzyme gel cleanser that gently exfoliates and removes pollutants from the skin, to reveal a brighter, smoother complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsEffectively remove dulling pollutants, dirt and impurities from the skin with this gently foaming gel cleanser and reveal a more even and radiant complexion.The skin-refining formula is infused with patented Tri-Enzyme Technology, antioxidant-rich Moringa and hydrating White Truffle to effectively resurface the skin while supporting its natural microflora.Research ResultsClinically proven to have a significant cleansing effect against physical pollution including micro-particles from the skin**Independent Clinical Trials 2019. Results based on 22 people over 1 day.Item 2533792How To UseFor optimal results, use this product morning and evening as part of the ELEMIS dynamic resurfacing program. Mix into the palms, adding a little warm water and gently massage over the face, neck and décolleté with light circular massage movements. Rinse off and pat the face dry with a clean towel. Avoid UV exposure when using this product.Precautions: Always use a high SPF during daylight hours and do not tan or use tanning beds while using this product.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates Copolymer, Polysorbate 20, Coco-Glucoside, Glycol Distearate, Glyceryl Oleate, Sodium Lactate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Phenoxyethanol, Lauryl Alcohol, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Chloride, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Papain, Disodium EDTA, Galactoarabinan*, Behenyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Benzoic Acid, Moringa Pterygosperma Seed Extract, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Disodium Phosphate, Stearyl Alcohol, Protease, Subtilisin, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Poria Cocos (White Truffle) Extract.*Extracted from Larch TreeShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For optimal results, use this product morning and evening as part of the ELEMIS dynamic resurfacing program. Mix into the palms, adding a little warm water and gently massage over the face, neck and décolleté with light circular massage movements. Rinse off and pat the face dry with a clean towel. Avoid UV exposure when using this product.Precautions: Always use a high SPF during daylight hours and do not tan or use tanning beds while using this product.
ingredients: Poria Cocos (White Truffle) Extract.*Extracted from Larch Tree

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL!
reviews.comments:
This cleanser truly is worth the price tag. Background info: 40 yrs old, dark skin, occasional cystic acne, post acne scars and hyperpigmentation. Along with other dietary changes and skin care products, this cleanser for has done an AMAZING job clearing out my pores, breaking up my post acne scars and smoothing my skin in only 1 month! I use this cleanser once daily at night since it exfoliates skin. I've tried using it 2x/day, but it felt drying. I can honestly say that this cleanser has completely enhanced the other products I use and has started giving me the skin of my dreams. Trust the process, don't over exfoliate, balance with a neutral cleanser for the AM and use SPF in the morning.
AM:
Kopari marine cleanser
Thayer rose witch hazel toner
Fenty SPF moisturizer 
PM:
ELEMIS CLEANSER
thayer rose witch hazel
Caudalie Vinoperfect glycolic essence
Caudalie Vinoperfect serum 
Ponds Clarant B3 moisturizer

reviews.headline: Only Face Wash I Swear By
reviews.comments: This face wash is so nice. It has been the only face wash I have ever used that works consistently. It is pricey but every dollar is so worth it. I have KP on my face along my jaw and it completely smooths out my skin and rebalances the feel of my skin. It does not dry me out and it smells rich and luxurious. I refuse to use anything except Elemis face washes. The way this works compares to NOTHING I have ever used. It does everything it claims and more. This is the perfect facewash to use before makeup because it has your base so smooth and ready to go.

reviews.headline: How is this so highly reviewed?
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and aboud fragrance but this had so many great reviews that i gave it a chance. Bad idea. Caused breakout every time i used it. Definitely returning.

reviews.headline: How is this so highly reviewed?
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and aboud fragrance but this had so many great reviews that i gave it a chance. Bad idea. Caused breakout every time i used it. Definitely returning.

reviews.headline: Best Face Wash I've EVER Used!
reviews.comments: I've tried many, many anti aging products over the past several years. I'm 50 and trying to protect, prevent, and correct aging. I saw some reviews as I have with do many others and thought I'd give it a try. I've never liked a product more. My face and décolleté have never been smoother and softer. I've only been using it for a week but wrinkles actually have softened. I highly recommend this product. BTW, it appears that it will last a really long time as well. I give it a 10 out of 10!!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Feels luxury, glowy skin

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I had a sample of this for months and never used it. I finally decided to try it and i was immediately sold. I used it for a week to be sure and I loved it more. It cleans perfectly and leaves my skin extra smooth and glowing. I have sensitive skin but this doesn't irritate at all.

reviews.headline: Favorite Cleanser Ever!
reviews.comments: This is the best cleanser I have ever used. The smell is heavenly and it is so silky and soft it feels like cashmere on my skin. It gives great balance to the oil and texture on my skin. I will use this product forever. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: A little luxury, a lot of glow
reviews.comments:
I do not care at all about face washes most of the time, jumping from one sample to another. After an explosive breakout, I knew it was time. Nothing  I was trying gave me that perfect clean feeling. 
After success with cleansing oil and some points saved, I am happy to say this is the best cleanser I've ever used. All those under the skin bumps are gone and complexion clear. I look forward to using it mostly due to the scent. It's so fresh. I know, it's a face wash but out of a plethora of soap for face, I kinda wish I could get this formula in a body wash.

reviews.headline: Amazing Cleanser!!!
reviews.comments: this is so good! got it on sale and now and now I love it! grab this when it's on sale for sure bc it is pricey! but worth it!

reviews.headline: Improves Texture
reviews.comments: This face wash has worked well to improve the texture of my skin. I would definitely recommend it. I gave it a 4 star instead of a 5 star due to the strong scent.

reviews.headline: This is an amazing cleanser!!
reviews.comments: I had rough dry flakes and bumps all over my face and within one use I felt a difference in my skin texture! It smells fantastic, kind of a sweet floral scent. You dont need much, a half a pump will suffice for washing your face and neck. It is strong though and can be drying or irritating if you have sensitive skin. Remember to wear your spf when using products like this! (It also helped clear some of the breakouts I was having)

reviews.headline: Outstanding face wash; it's worked for me
reviews.comments: I started using Elemis products last year and this face wash is tied for my favorite of the bunch (alongside the resurfacing day cream). I have combo skin. It gets all my makeup off easily, doesn't dry me out and has improved my skin texture a lot.

reviews.headline: Bad made me breakout
reviews.comments: Made me breakout the morning after using i dont think ill try again

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: My skin is smooth and clean! I love it.

reviews.headline: Great but …
reviews.comments: I loved this face wash but 3 days in I started breaking out. I tried three separate times and I broke out each time

reviews.headline: It's fine
reviews.comments: Initially I really liked this cleanser. I have extremely sensitive skin, and it didn't seem to irritate me. I used this cleanser in the morning after a workout. It just didn't seem to do much for my skin. I wouldn't say it's bad, it just didn't do enough for me for the price.

reviews.headline: Great smooth
reviews.comments:
I have been a customer of Elemis Face Wash for several years. I used the regular size squeeze tube in the past
and it worked well. I have semi-oily skin and need a quality cleaner that also tightens my pores. My skin is
in excellent shape for my age. I found that the Elemis cleared up the oily patches and smoothed out the texture
of my skin. I also use it on my neck and around my earlobes. It has always been a wonderful face cleaner for
me to use. I recently purchased the Elemis Pump Face Wash and love it even more! For me it is more user friendly.
It is a well designed bottle and is also very attractive if you want to leave it sitting out. The face wash leaves my face
feeling clean and refreshed. It adds radiance to my skin after I rinse it off and pat dry. I noticed that the oily
patches stay clean for hours after usage. I would recommend this Elemis face wash to any person of any age, 
gender or race.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: In the beginning of using this product, I honestly liked it because it felt so silky and smooth on my skin and saw nice results of clean face. But after a couple weeks of using it consistently, my skin started to get more drier and drier. And the smell of it is not too good either. Trust me, don't purchase this pls.

reviews.headline: New favorite face wash
reviews.comments: I hate how expensive this is because it is wonderful. However, a little goes a long ways.

media.headline: The face wash I've been looking for!!
A cleanser that actually feels like it works
Left my face feeling clean and moisturized
I love it! It makes my skin so soft and smooth!
My face has never been this soft!!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've been using this product (in conjunction with a few other Elemis products) for about 2 weeks now and I wish I took a before picture of my face because it's a huge change for me. 

The small bumps and irritation went away in about 2-3 days and it seems as if my pigmentation marks are SLOWLY fading. I really love Elemis products, I came off of them for awhile and now that I am back on - I doubt I'll change ever again.

I do wish that Elemis came out with a line that helps skin recover after sever trauma, like an accident. My younger sister was in an accident and there's not much out there.

I got her the Dynamic set to help prevent hyperpigmentation, however, if Elemis had like a face cooling gel mask or something that would help prevent swelling on the face (while reducing the risk of infection) or some skin healing promoting pills that would be awesome.

I'm actually very surprised that Elemis hasn't come out with a proper skin, hair and nails vitamin yet that puts every one to shame. 

All in all, this product is a MUST have and it will last you an incredible long time!
faceoff_positive.headline: Small bumps be gone!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I was really excited to try this cleanser and frankly I am a little disappointed. It leaves my skin feeling clean and not too dry, removes makeup well. I just don't feel like it's anything extraordinary for me. I don't see a difference in skin texture or overall tone. It is effective, but not any more than products that are a fraction of the price. It's just not worth the money to me. If you are a person who is searching for a good cleanser and money is not an object, then this would work great for you. I personally just can't justify spending so much on something that isn't doing anything long term for my skin. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
faceoff_negative.headline: A good cleanser, just not for me
